answer: BBB iPlayer viewing or usage increased, with 22% of BBC television content viewed via iPlayer (up from 14% in 2022). BBC Online used by 60% of adults each month in 2024/25 (up from 55% in 2023/24).
ground_truth: BBC Online account usage grew 11% year-on-year in 2023; BBC iPlayer had a record-breaking year in 2023
